definition: to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Software copyright holders must pay a registration fee according to the rules.
sentences.chinese: 软件著作权人还应当按规定交纳登记费。

sentences.english: It was to protect such specific moral products of human creativity that the Copyright Law is legislated.
sentences.chinese: 著作权法正是为保护这种特殊的精神产品而存在。

sentences.english: Without the creation of copyright person, whole knowledge industry is the wood that does not have a root.
sentences.chinese: 没有著作权人的创作，整个知识产业都是无根之木。

sentences.english: The right of renting should be confirmed as an independent right of the copyright owner.
sentences.chinese: 出租权应当确认为著作权人一项独立的权利。

sentences.english: This book is copyright protected so no adaption should be made without the writer's permission.
sentences.chinese: 这本书受著作权保护，未经作者许可，不得擅自改编。

sentences.english: The crime of infringement on copyright has different meaning in criminal law and criminology.
sentences.chinese: 侵犯著作权犯罪在刑法学和犯罪学上具有不同的意义。

sentences.english: There should be four elements for network copyrights violations.
sentences.chinese: 网络作品著作权侵权行为的构成宜采四要件说。

sentences.english: Article 21 of the Law shall be applicable after authorship of the work becomes ascertained.
sentences.chinese: 作者身份一旦确定，适用著作权法第二十一条的规定。

sentences.english: Article 2 The National Copyright Administration shall be responsible for the pledge registration of copyrights.
sentences.chinese: 第二条国家版权局负责著作权质权登记工作。

sentences.english: Of the copyright of the CD-ROM of all.
sentences.chinese: 本光盘的著作权归作者所有。

sentences.english: Money has not been divided, it is meddlesome to nature of everybody of broad music copyright.
sentences.chinese: 钱还没分完，对广大音乐著作权所有人自然是好事。

sentences.english: The acknowledgement of the edition of The Historical Romance of Three Kingdoms established Luo Guanzhong's copyright.
sentences.chinese: 《三国志演义》版本的题署，确定了罗贯中的著作权。

sentences.english: The act of transfer does not alter ownership of software copyright.
sentences.chinese: 转让活动的发生不改变该软件著作权的保护期。

sentences.english: The copyright holder may pay appropriate remunerations to the writers.
sentences.chinese: 著作权人可以支付执笔人适当的报酬。

sentences.english: Article 217 of penal law stipulates that four actions are infringement of copyright.
sentences.chinese: 刑法第217条规定了四种侵犯著作权的犯罪行为。

sentences.english: Publications include over 50 papers and 3 books and 3 software copyrights.
sentences.chinese: 发表论文50多篇，著书3部，获软件著作权6项。

definition: to infringe the rights of/to violate/infringement
to embezzle/to defraud/to use illegitimately/to misappropriate
